entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
